about_the_game:
It's not just any garage. Of course, you'll see tools, shelves, tables, spare parts, and equipment to enhance cars... but you'll also find a BBQ and the iconic 1970 Dodge Charger. Experience Fast & Furious, the high-speed street racing saga, amidst all muscle speedsters and a crew bound by loyalty.

And the 1970 Dodge Charger R/T won't just be in the garage, but it will also be part of your collection, ready to leave some tire marks on the asphalt! Alongside it, you'll find the unforgettable Nissan Skyline GT-R R34 and 95 Mitsubishi Eclipse, as well as the stunning supercar W Motors Lykan HyperSport.

Enter Dom’s Garage and unleash the fury of hundreds of horsepower with the unmissable HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Fast & Furious Expansion Pack.

This DLC includes:
  • 1 Environment to build your tracks: Dom’s Garage;
  • 4 Vehicles: Nissan Skyline GT-R R34, 1970 Dodge Charger R/T, 95 Mitsubishi Eclipse, W Motors Lykan HyperSport;
  • 1 new area to add to the Hot Wheels™ Creature Rampage mode
  • Background, Profile icon, Tag and Card Background to further customize your Unleashed Profile!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Season Pass Vol. 2.

short_description: Step into Dom’s Garage, where you can transform your cars into true four-wheeled powerhouses, and experience the thrills of Fast & Furious with the most adrenaline-pumping set of cars inspired by the films!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Indonesian*
*languages with full audio support
